Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4

Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.Pizza
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BBQChicken, BuildYourOwn, Deluxe, Meatzza
public abstract class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
The Pizza class is an abstract class that implements the Customizable interface. The Pizza class includes the shared attributes between all pizza types including topping list, crust, and size.
Author:
Serena Zeng, Jackson Lee
